channel.title: Players
channel.description: How do i make it so when you do ::players this dosnt pop up - http://prntscr.com/18koqt and the only thing that shows when you do ::players is There Are Currently (amount of players) Online in the chat ?

item.title: Players
item.dc:creator: @tinyscape TinyScape
item.description:
@tinyscape wrote:

In your players command,
Replace:
c.getPA().showInterface(interfaceID);
With:
c.sendMessage("" + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + “Player(s) online.”);

Then just remove the unneeded code from the command.

Read full topic
